author: markrmiller
msg: SOLR-3993: If multiple SolrCore's for a shard coexist on a node, on cluster restart, leader election would stall until timeout, waiting to see all of  the replicas come up.

msg: OAK-438 Provide the lucene index as an osgi bundle

author: markrmiller
msg: SOLR-4067: ZkStateReader#getLeaderProps should not return props for a leader that it does not think is live.
